divs: Sighting Details1) I was in my bed when I noticed a bright whitish blue light drop out of the sky, stop, change shape into a cross like object and then shoot off getting smaller and smaller until it disappeared. 2) I first noticed it because it was so bright, it lit up my back yard. 3) I thought it was first a shooting star, but then it stopped abruptly, shifted its shape and then took off in a light speed manner. 4) Round and a brilliant whitish bluish light that had awesome control over its speed and capable of other dimensional travel or extreme speed 5) Every hair on my body stood straight up, I could not believe my eyes, I was excited yet scared, it was like nothing I have ever seen before 6) It flew away at extreme speed and vanished
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around September 8th 2013
Summary: HUGE white/bluish orb dropped out of sky changed shape and dissapeared
